details.title: An IEEE standards-based visualization tool for knowledge discovery in maintenance event sequences
details.abstract: This paper described the initial and ongoing development of a tool that facilitates improved knowledge discovery within maintenance data by transforming data records into ontology-based event graphs and providing several filterable visualizations of event sequences through time. We accomplish several major preprocessing objectives, such as records-to-ontology event mapping and the resolution of date conflicts in the aggregated records of events.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
